thread.title: Embarcadero to Showcase DB PowerStudio 2016 at PASS Summit
thread.title_full: Embarcadero to Showcase DB PowerStudio 2016 at PASS Summit

author: admin
title: Embarcadero to Showcase DB PowerStudio 2016 at PASS Summit
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 1:56 PM   Embarcadero Technologies 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/23/15 -- Embarcadero Technologies , a leading provider of software solutions for application and database development, will showcase and share insights on DB PowerStudio® 2016 at PASS Summit 2015. The event takes place October 27-30 in Seattle, and is the largest conference for Microsoft SQL Server professionals. 
Announced last month, DB PowerStudio 2016 is Embarcadero's new suite of database tools. It includes DBArtisan® 2016, a team-enabled, cross-platform solution for database administration, monitoring and performance; and Rapid SQL® 2016, the industry's only intelligent SQL IDE that enables developers and DBAs to create high-performing SQL queries on all databases using a single interface. Performance IT, the new SQL optimization technology for high-speed performance and database management that is now available with DBArtisan and Rapid SQL 2016, will be highlighted at the event. Performance IQ is enabled by DB Team Server providing 24/7 monitoring of databases, determines the underlying cause of performance degradation and visually highlights the root cause for all major areas of DBMS performance. 
PASS Summit 2015 | October 27 - 30, 2015 Washington State Convention Center, Seattle, WA Embarcadero Booth #410 
The Embarcadero exhibit will showcase DB PowerStudio 2016. Product experts will be on hand to share insights on how DBAs, data architects, and developers can increase productivity and boost database performance. Embarcadero is hosting a customer appreciation networking event during the PASS Summit, and conference attendees are also invited to attend the Pinal Dave book signing in the Embarcadero booth. 
Embarcadero Customer Appreciation Breakfast Customers attending PASS Summit are invited to join the Embarcadero team at a Customer Appreciation Breakfast: 
Thursday October 29, 2015 Daily Grill, 629 Pike Street, Seattle WA To register to attend the Embarcadero Customer Appreciation Breakfast, visit http://embt.co/1Gkdcbw 
Pinal Dave Book Signing Customers and PASS Summit attendees are invited to meet SQL Server professional and prominent author Pinal Dave at a book signing in the Embarcadero booth: 
Thursday October 29, 2015 1:00 - 1:30PM Embarcadero booth #410 
Registration: To register to attend PASS Summit 2015 visit http://embt.co/1kvMPFL (Promo code: EXSP150 will give you a $150 discount) 
Tweet this: .@EmbarcaderoTech will showcase @DBPowerStudio 2016 in booth #410 at SQL Pass Summit in Seattle http://embt.co/1GdXBK9 #sqlpass #Summit15 
About Embarcadero Technologies Embarcadero Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of award-winning tools for application developers and database professionals so they can design systems right, build them faster and run them better, regardless of their platform or programming language. Ninety of the Fortune 100 and an active community of more than three million users worldwide rely on Embarcadero products to increase productivity, reduce costs, simplify change management and compliance, and accelerate innovation. Founded in 1993, Embarcadero is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices located around the world. To learn more, please visit www.embarcadero.com . Contact:
